text: "Why Don't You Get a Job?" is a 1998 song by American rock band The Offspring. ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== Chart (1999) Peak position Europe (Eurochart Hot 100) 6 Greece (IFPI) 10 Iceland (√çslenski Listinn Topp 40) 2 Italy (Musica e dischi) 12 ===Year-end charts=== Chart (1999) Position Australia (ARIA) 9 Belgium (Ultratop 50 Flanders) 94 Belgium (Ultratop 50 Wallonia) 95 Canada Rock/Alternative (RPM) 29 Europe (Eurochart Hot 100) 85 Netherlands (Dutch Top 40) 57 Netherlands (Single Top 100) 46 Romania (Romanian Top 100) 27 Sweden (Sverigetopplistan) 11 US Alternative Songs (Billboard) 14 US Mainstream Rock (Billboard) 38 ==Certifications== ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1998 songs Category:The Offspring songs
